name: RxcDna
description: DNA token is a secondary token of Ran X Crypto that launched Q4 of 2021. Similar to Traditional Servers where vote points and game time points can be obtained by doing certain tasks for the server, $DNA Tokens can be collected by finishing daily quests. The Vote Shop that is being used by the traditional servers have been replaced by the DNA Shop where you can use your $DNA Token to purchase essential items.
